name: FUN_ITEM_DESC_IN_LOV
body_snippet:
function FUN_ITEM_DESC_IN_LOV(parm_master_id NUMBER,
                                                parm_table_name VARCHAR2
                                                ) return varchar2 is
     --THIS FUNCTION RETURNS SHORT DESCRIPTION OF ALL ITEMS IN DETAIL TABLE--------
     --AND IS CALLED FROM MATCH WITH LOV OF TRANSACTIONAL FORMS--------------------
     --CREATED BY GULISTAN ON 16-OCT-2003------------------------------------------
     lvch_item_short_desc VARCHAR2(4000);
begin
     lvch_item_short_desc := NULL;
     IF UPPER(parm_table_name) = 'SO' THEN
        FOR ITEM_CUR IN (SELECT IMT.ITEM_SHORT_DESC
      									 FROM SALES_ORDER_DET SODET,
           							 ITEMS_MT IMT
      									 WHERE SODET.ITEM_ID = IMT.ITEM_ID
      									 AND   SODET.SALES_ORDER_ID = parm_master_id)LOOP
            IF lvch_item_short_desc IS NULL THEN
               lvch_item_short_desc := lvch_item_short_desc ||ITEM_CUR.ITEM_SHORT_DESC;
            ELSE
               lvch_item_short_desc := lvch_item_short_desc ||','||ITEM_CUR.ITEM_SHORT_DESC;
            END IF;
        END LOOP;
     ELSIF UPPER(parm_table_name) = 'PO' THEN
        FOR ITEM_CUR IN (SELECT IMT.ITEM_SHORT_DESC
      									 FROM PURCHASE_ORDER_DET PODET,
           							 ITEMS_MT IMT
      									 WHERE PODET.ITEM_ID = IMT.ITEM_ID
      									 AND   PODET.ORDER_ID = parm_master_id)LOOP
            IF lvch_item_short_desc IS NULL THEN
               lvch_item_short_desc := lvch_item_short_desc ||IT
